issue.title: Problem with camera when instantiating two of the same robot type

content.raw: I think this might be related to #78 - I haven't quite been able to track down exactly what is getting launched by `virtual_stix.ign` \(my ruby is weak\) but it seems like it loads `subt_ros/launch/competition_init.launch` [here](#!/osrf/subt/src/ab3dc781bc331c78472599125d2375e42d068f25/subt_ign/launch/virtual_stix.ign#lines-55) with `vehicle_topics.launch` using fixed names \(X1, X2, X3, X4\). Not sure how that interacts with the part of the `spawnX1` function, for example, where it loads `vehicle_topics.launch` again.
content.html: I think this might be related to #78 - I haven't quite been able to track down exactly what is getting launched by virtual_stix.ign (my ruby is weak) but it seems like it loads subt_ros/launch/competition_init.launch here with vehicle_topics.launch using fixed names (X1, X2, X3, X4). Not sure how that interacts with the part of the spawnX1 function, for example, where it loads vehicle_topics.launch again.
